Articles.Content:
So I want to put a space station in orbit, but without all the hassle of making more than one trip. So what do I do?

Stick 6 medium lifter rockets together!

So now I have the largest rocket I have ever seen in this game. 42 first stage engines, with 4 fuel tanks each. I did have to use one Damned Robotics part though, the truss.

Pics: http://imgur.com/a/BOQBc#0

Pastebin data: http://pastebin.com/VE3rbkZR

Requires 0.15.2 and Damned Robotics
